SHR StainingControlVS ValueSet

Staining of control cells, required if staining is negative.

title: SHR StainingControlVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Staining of control cells, required if staining is negative.

concept.display: Internal control cells present and stain as expected
Internal control cells present; no immunoreactivity of either tumor cells or internal controls
